page.title: 15ASCOT POLICE STATION Part 2
page.content: The main Police Station of this area is Bracknell.Ascot is considered a small station.During Royal Ascot week however the station is very busy.It was specially designed to cope with law and order during race meetings. During Royal Ascot Week 250 men are stationed here and this is their headquarters.They set up rooms to control the race meetings from here. The most important man during this time is Chief Constable Mr. Colin Smith. The usual crimes that are dealt with during that week are petty fights over betting and drunkeness.
